title: How to Get Legendary Pokémon Celebi on Pokémon Crystal

steps.title: Enter 01FB04D2 into the cheat window of your emulator.
steps.content: Enter 01FB04D2 into the cheat window of your emulator. Access this cheat window by hitting the “Cheats” menu within your emulator. Label the cheat as “Celebi” in the “Description” box, and then enter 01FB04D2 in the “Code” box. The next Pokémon you encounter in the wild will now be a Celebi! [2] X Research source If this cheat code doesn’t work, try 91FB04D2 instead. Want a shiny Celebi? Enter the code 910730D2 in your cheat console (in addition to the Celebi code that’s already there). The next Pokémon you find should be a shiny Celebi—just keep in mind that the cheat prevents you from being able to run from battle.

steps.title: Beat the Pokémon League.
steps.content: Beat the Pokémon League. The Celebi event only unlocks after you’ve defeated the Elite 4 as well as Pokémon Champion Lance.

steps.title: Visit the Pokémon Center in Goldenrod City.
steps.content: Visit the Pokémon Center in Goldenrod City. Once you move around inside the building, an NPC will speak to you and give you a GS Ball, which is automatically put with your things. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Visit Kurt in Azalea Town and wait until midnight.
steps.content: Visit Kurt in Azalea Town and wait until midnight. Let Kurt inspect the GS Ball—he will take it and begin his investigation, which lasts until midnight. If you’d like to speed things up, save and reboot your game. As it restarts, press the SELECT + B + the down arrow of the control pad. Release B + the down arrow (while still pressing SELECT ) and press down on the up and left control pad arrows instead. Let go of SELECT and submit the password you receive from this site .

steps.title: Chat with Kurt and head into the Ilex Forest.
steps.content: Chat with Kurt and head into the Ilex Forest. Head north in the forest and cut down a tree to reach a shrine. Kurt will give the GS Ball back to you when you talk.

steps.title: Save and put the GS Ball in the shrine to catch Celebi.
steps.content: Save and put the GS Ball in the shrine to catch Celebi. Celebi will appear once you’ve inserted the ball, so make sure you’ve saved your game beforehand! Enter the battle and do your best to catch Celebi; if something goes wrong, simply reload your game and try again. Want a shiny Celebi? Keep resetting your game until the Celebi appears light pink when it spawns—that’s how you know it’s shiny. This can take a lot of time and patience, though, so stick with it!
